ingredients.ingredient: 2 cups fresh blueberries, rinsed and dried

cookingTips: Ensure blueberries are completely dryâ€”any moisture will cause chocolate to seize
Dip berries quickly and set on parchment to cool at room temperature
Work in small batches to keep chocolate at optimal temperature
enrichment.coachingPrompt: The key to success is dry berries and tempered chocolate. Emphasize the importance of thorough drying and gentle dipping technique for a thin, elegant chocolate coating.
